name: Aave
description: Aave is a decentralized money market running on the Ethereum blockchain. It helps users to lend and borrow a range of crypto assets.

en.name: Aave
en.description: Aave is a decentralized money market running on the Ethereum blockchain. It helps users to lend and borrow a range of crypto assets.

fr.name: Aave
fr.description: Aave est un marché monétaire décentralisé (decentralized money market) fonctionnant sur la blockchain Ethereum. Il permet aux utilisateurs de prêter et  emprunter une gamme d'actifs cryptographiques.

es.name: Aave
es.description: Aave es un mercado monetario descentralizado que se ejecuta en la blockchain de Ethereum. Ayuda a los usuarios a prestar y pedir prestado una variedad de criptoactivos.

de.name: Aave
de.description: Aave ist ein dezentraler Geldmarkt, der auf der Ethereum-Blockchain läuft. Er hilft Nutzern, eine Reihe von Krypto-Vermögenswerten zu leihen und zu verleihen.

pt.name: Aave
pt.description: Aave é um mercado monetário descentralizado rodando no blockchain Ethereum. Ele auxilia usuários a emprestar e tomar emprestado um leque de criptoativos.

el.name: Aave
el.description: Aave is a decentralized money market running on the Ethereum blockchain. It helps users to lend and borrow a range of crypto assets.

tr.name: Aave
tr.description: Aave, Ethereum blok zincirinde çalışan merkezi olmayan bir para piyasasıdır. Kullanıcıların çeşitli kripto varlıklarını ödünç vermesine ve ödünç almasına yardımcı olur.

vi.name: Aave
vi.description: Aave is a decentralized money market running on the Ethereum blockchain. It helps users to lend and borrow a range of crypto assets.

zh.name: Aave
zh.description: Aave is a decentralized money market running on the Ethereum blockchain. It helps users to lend and borrow a range of crypto assets.

hi.name: Aave
hi.description: Aave एथेरियम ब्लॉकचेन पर चलने वाला एक विकेन्द्रीकृत मुद्रा बाजार है। यह उपयोगकर्ताओं को क्रिप्टोकरेंसी परिसंपत्तियों की एक श्रृंखला को उधार देने और उधार लेने में मदद करता है।

ja.name: Aave
ja.description: Aaveは、イーサリアムブロックチェーン上で動作する分散型マネーマーケットです。ユーザーがさまざまな暗号資産を貸し借りできるよう支援します。

id.name: Aave
id.description: Aave is a decentralized money market running on the Ethereum blockchain. It helps users to lend and borrow a range of crypto assets.

ru.name: Aave
ru.description: Aave is a decentralized money market running on the Ethereum blockchain. It helps users to lend and borrow a range of crypto assets.
